thread.title: One Direction making summer stop at Madame Tussauds Orlando
thread.title_full: One Direction making summer stop at Madame Tussauds Orlando

author: Cindy Barth
title: One Direction making summer stop at Madame Tussauds Orlando
text: One Direction making summer stop at Madame Tussauds Orlando Jul 6, 2015, 5:31pm EDT Madame Tussauds Orlando Harry Styles and the rest of his bandmates from One Direction will be at Madame Tussauds… more One Direction’s wax figures have landed at Madame Tussauds Orlando, and fans can take the selfies of Niall, Harry, Liam, Louis and even Zayn in an exclusive reunion for the band since Zayn’s departure from the group this past spring. Madame Tussauds Orlando is teaming up with Macy’s for a special social media contest that kicked off July 6 where 15 One Direction fans will receive makeovers from Macy’s and be among the first to meet the One Direction figures ahead of the public. Starting July 8, One Direction fans will be able to take photos and get up close and personal with their favorite band member. The figures are in a seated position on bleachers, so fans can interact with the entire group. Related Content
